pdfset:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
Labor Terms: ${record.terms} Pay Invoice via ACH or Credit Card Non-Labor Terms:${record.terms}
Page of
Sentinel Technologies, Inc. Visit us at SENTINEL.COM InfoSENter (800) 769-4343
INVOICE
${record.billaddress@label} Customer #${record.entity?keep_before(" ")}
Please Remit To:
${companyInformation.custrecord_atlas_svcs_mm_bankdetails}
${companyInformation.custrecord_atlas_svcs_mm_phone}
Attention: ${record.billattention}
${record.billaddressee}
${record.billaddr1}
<#if record.billaddr2?has_content> ${record.billaddr2}
</#if> ${record.billcity}, ${record.billstate} ${record.billzip}
Purchase Order Reference# Contract Addendum Account Manager Invoice Date Invoice#
${record.otherrefnum}
<#if record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Channel Online'> ${record.createdfrom} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Projects'> ${record.custbody_sti_sn_project_number} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Service Tickets'> ${record.custbody_sti_service_ticket} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Sales Orders' && record.custbody_sti_service_ticket != ''> ${record.custbody_sti_service_ticket} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Sales Orders' && record.custbody_sti_service_ticket == ''> ${record.createdfrom} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'SuiteBilling'> <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == ''> ${record.createdfrom} </#if>
${record.salesrep} ${record.trandate} ${record.tranid}
Description of Services PCR Reference
<#if record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Channel Online'> ${record.custbody_sti_invoice_type} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Projects'> ${record.custbody_sti_project_name} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Sales Orders'> ${record.custbody_ctc_u_short_description} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Service Tickets'> ${record.custbody_ctc_u_short_description} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'SuiteBilling'> ${record.custbody_ctc_u_short_description} <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == ''> <#if record.custbody_ctc_u_short_description != ''> ${record.custbody_ctc_u_short_description} <#else> ${record.custbody_sti_project_name}</#if> </#if>
<#assign finalItems = []> <#assign processedKeys = []>
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group != "" && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == false>
<#assign groupKey = "_" + item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group>
<#if !processedKeys?seq_contains(groupKey)>
<#assign tempQuantity = 0> <#assign tempAmount = 0> <#assign tempDescription = []>
<#list record.item as subItem> <#if item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group != ""> <#assign subGroupKey = "_" + subItem.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group> <#if groupKey == subGroupKey> <#assign tempQuantity = tempQuantity + subItem.quantity> <#assign tempAmount = tempAmount + subItem.amount> <#assign tempDescription = tempDescription + [subItem.description] > </#if> </#if> </#list>
<#assign finalItems = finalItems + [{"item": item.item, "description": tempDescription?join("
"), "quantity": tempQuantity, "rate": item.rate, "amount": tempAmount, "custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group": item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group, "shipaddress": item.shipaddress, "custcol_sti_do_not_print": item.custcol_sti_do_not_print, "suppress": item.custcol_suppress_on_inv_print, "startdate": item.custcol_ns_service_start, "enddate": item.custcol_ns_service_end}]>
<#assign processedKeys = processedKeys + [groupKey]>
</#if> <#else> <#assign finalItems = finalItems + [{"item": item.item, "description": item.description, "quantity": item.quantity, "rate": item.rate, "amount": item.amount, "custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group": item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group, "shipaddress": item.shipaddress, "custcol_sti_do_not_print": item.custcol_sti_do_not_print, "suppress": item.custcol_suppress_on_inv_print, "startdate": item.custcol_ns_service_start, "enddate": item.custcol_ns_service_end}]> </#if> </#list>
<#-- Function to get address up to the state line --> <#function getAddressUpToState address> <#-- Split address into lines --> <#assign lines = address?split("
")> <#assign result = "">
<#-- Loop through lines and add until we find the state abbreviation --> <#list lines as line> <#if line?matches(".*[A-Z]{2}.*")> <#-- Add the line with the state and break --> <#assign result += line> <#break> <#else> <#-- Add the line and newline --> <#assign result += line + "
"> </#if> </#list>
<#-- Trim and return the result -->
<#return result> </#function>
<#if record.item?has_content> <#assign ctr = 8>
Description Address Qty Unit Price Ext Price
<#if record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true> <#assign processedGroups = []> <#list finalItems?sort_by("custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group") as outerItem> <#if processedGroups?seq_index_of(outerItem.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group) == -1 >
<#assign currentGroup = outerItem.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group> <#assign processedGroups = processedGroups + [outerItem.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group]>
<#if currentGroup != "">
${outerItem.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group}
</#if> <#list finalItems?sort_by("custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group") as item> <#if item.custcol_sti_do_not_print == false && currentGroup == item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group>
<#assign itemName = item.item + "
"> <#if record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'SuiteBilling'> <#assign itemName = ""></#if> <#if item.suppress == true> <#assign itemName = ""> </#if> <#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_part_on_invoice == true> <#assign itemName = ""></#if> <#if item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group?has_content && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == false> ${item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group} <#elseif item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group?has_content && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true> <#if item.startdate?has_content && item.enddate?has_content> ${item.startdate} - ${item.enddate}
</#if>${item.description} <#else>${itemName} <#if item.startdate?has_content && item.enddate?has_content> ${item.startdate} - ${item.enddate}
</#if>${item.description} </#if>
<#if (record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true) || (item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group == "" && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == false)><#if item.shipaddress != ""> ${getAddressUpToState(item.shipaddress)} <#else>${record.shipaddr1}
${record.shipcity}<#if record.shipstate != "">, ${record.shipstate} </#if></#if></#if>
<#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_qty_on_invoice == true> <#else> <#if (record.custbody_sti_suppress_qty_on_invoice == false && item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group == "") || record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true>${item.quantity}</#if> </#if>
<#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_price_on_invoice == true> <#else> <#if (record.custbody_sti_suppress_price_on_invoice == false && item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group == "") || record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true> ${item.rate} </#if> </#if>
<#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_price_on_invoice == false> ${item.amount?string.currency}</#if>
<#assign ctr = ctr-1> <#if ctr == -1><#assign ctr = 8></#if> </#if> </#list> </#if>
</#list> <#else> <#list finalItems as item> <#if item.custcol_sti_do_not_print == false>
<#assign itemName = item.item + "
"> <#if record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'SuiteBilling'> <#assign itemName = ""></#if> <#if item.suppress == true> <#assign itemName = ""> </#if> <#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_part_on_invoice == true> <#assign itemName = ""></#if> <#if item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group?has_content && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == false> ${item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group} <#elseif item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group?has_content && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true> ${item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group}
<#if item.startdate?has_content && item.enddate?has_content> ${item.startdate} - ${item.enddate}
</#if>${item.description} <#else>${itemName} <#if item.startdate?has_content && item.enddate?has_content> ${item.startdate} - ${item.enddate}
</#if> ${item.description} </#if>
<#if (record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true) || (item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group == "" && record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == false)><#if item.shipaddress != ""> ${getAddressUpToState(item.shipaddress)} <#else>${record.shipaddr1}
${record.shipcity}<#if record.shipstate != "">, ${record.shipstate} </#if></#if></#if>
<#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_qty_on_invoice == true> <#else> <#if (record.custbody_sti_suppress_qty_on_invoice == false && item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group == "") || record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true>${item.quantity}</#if> </#if>
<#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_price_on_invoice == true> <#else> <#if (record.custbody_sti_suppress_price_on_invoice == false && item.custcol_sti_line_trans_invoice_group == "") || record.custbody_sti_expand_invoice_groups_inv == true> ${item.rate} </#if> </#if>
<#if record.custbody_sti_suppress_price_on_invoice == false> ${item.amount?string.currency}</#if>
<#assign ctr = ctr-1> <#if ctr == -1><#assign ctr = 8></#if> </#if> </#list> </#if>
Sub-Total
${record.subtotal}
Total Taxes
${record.taxtotal}
Total Payable in USD
${record.total}
</#if>
<#assign invoicetype = '' > <#if record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'Service Tickets'> <#assign invoicetype = 'service' /> <#elseif record.custbody_sti_invoice_type == 'SuiteBilling'> <#assign invoicetype = 'suitebilling' /> </#if> <#include "https://7493949.extforms.netsuite.com/app/site/hosting/scriptlet.nl?script=3178&deploy=1&compid=7493949&ns-at=AAEJ7tMQLiZuPl0D4P0PuSAbM8uahn_f1itxJPiG7Q7v26PT0vE&type=${invoicetype}&invoice=${record.id}" />
